events.message: I received the wrong size for my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's message mentions a refund request due to receiving the wrong size product.
Case assigned to agent Emily R. for processing the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want a refund because you received the wrong size.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product received so we can verify the issue?
Here is my order number 45321X and attached is a photo showing the size tag does not match what I ordered.
Thank you for the info. We can issue a full refund or send you the correct size free of cost. Which option do you prefer?
I would prefer the refund option, please. Thank you for handling this promptly.
Your refund has been processed and should appear on your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that the refund was received. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since we have not heard back, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support, and have a great day!
We would appreciate it if you could take a moment to complete a short satisfaction survey about your support experience.
